Articles.Content:
Voting now open for FASA part.

IVA Mercury

Apollo SM mini probe

Surveyor probe core

Probe Sized RTG

M-1 engine

RL-10 is being made along with a multi-engine adapter.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80332-FASA-Part-Vote

For the re-entry part, have you seen Bobcat's updated Soyuz?? It has a landing mode which moves it to controlled re-entry attitude and scorches the capsule. Mebbe it could be coded to work with Apollo?

Cool! I will have to check that out. I have gone over Bobcat's parts in the past, but have been focusing in FASA Saturn 5 hardware recently

Voting now open for FASA part.

IVA Mercury

Apollo SM mini probe

Surveyor probe core

Probe Sized RTG

M-1 engine

RL-10 is being made along with a multi-engine adapter.

Broken, the link is.

Instead of a PART can i ask for a plugin config? I am using Hot Rockets and would love for compatibility and possibly some special effects for the f1?

I'd rather pester Nazari, the HotRockets author about this. Frizzank seems to prefer no dependencies for FASA.

Results were both horrifying and awesome....

Missing parts?

Crazy Amazing! Flying this mod to the Right Stuff soundtrack is just to awesome.

Downloaded today (5/19) and must be blind... I can't five any 5x engine plates... might someone please point me to it? The J2 plate is here...

Thanks for the assist...
Literally large enough to blot out the sun. Such power must be used wisely.

Results were both horrifying and awesome....

Error, Apollo to Jool mission much???? Would love to see it added lol!!! Would be a nice super-heavy lifter for large and heavy station parts/interplanetary vehicles.......

Hi all...

About the LM (Apollo) .... it seems very unbalanced... I am chewing through mono propellant like mad whenever I've got the descent engine running just to keep her pointing the right way.

Is this something everyone is seeing?

Do I have something configured wrong?

Thx...

Literally large enough to blot out the sun. Such power must be used wisely.

Space Jam.. With asteroids.

Been a lil busy...

http://imgur.com/a/NVbvr

Wow. That's one neat Nova. If M-1 wins the pool, it needs to come with a 5m dual adapter and the Nova-scale tanks. I just found it' was an upper stage engine for the Nova, the first one using 8 friggin' F-1s. That design beat even nuke powered Novas in sheer payload capacity.

Missing parts?

Crazy Amazing! Flying this mod to the Right Stuff soundtrack is just to awesome.

Downloaded today (5/19) and must be blind... I can't five any 5x engine plates... might someone please point me to it? The J2 plate is here...

Thanks for the assist...

You have to get the beta download, main one is not finished yet.

Hi all...

About the LM (Apollo) .... it seems very unbalanced... I am chewing through mono propellant like mad whenever I've got the descent engine running just to keep her pointing the right way.

Is this something everyone is seeing?

Do I have something configured wrong?

Thx...

make sure your lander is balanced. the two different legs have different centers of mass and putting the same on both sides is essential.

Results were both horrifying and awesome....

Ahhhh please please I hope the nova parts win!

Ahhhh please please I hope the nova parts win!

That's what I meant. I meant the M1 engine.

So I am going to "Try Out" the new curse website. It looks like it has some nice features and if they all work it will be a welcomed change. If your completely appalled by the use of Curse I will post a second download on MediaFire as well.

Curse sight needs approval before its public....
